reviews.text: Have been patronising this stall for a long time. Food quality is good and service is excellent. Highly recommend the lemon butter grilled fish, fried spring chicken, and baked rice.

Good good quality with cheap price. Ordered their signature Char-Grilled Chicken chop for $6.90, there are 2 side dishes you can choose out of 11 options which I like the most,plus the vegetables are all fresh.
Also,they provide cutlery in a basket with a tissue paper on it.
Definitely my first choice of western food in Singapore.

Fried rice with pork chop is reasonable. But i like pork chop with the 2 sides dishes. Mutton has shrunk is size
Easy to find table at this kopitiam
My favorite go to place for Western food! The chargrilled chicken chop is tender and juicy and the accompanying 2 side dishes are also good. Value for money neighborhood place!
